maqras.text: 78|1|tara eke an'yera kache ki bisaye jijnasabada karache
78|5|tarapara bali kakhano na, tara acire'i janate parabe.
78|8|ara amara srsti karechi tomaderake joraya joraya
78|12|ara amara nirmana karechi tomadera upare sudrrha sata akasa [1]
78|14|Ara amara barsana karechi meghamala hate pracura bari [1]
78|15|yate ta dbara amara utpanna kari sasya, udbhida
78|18|sedina singaya phumka deya habe takhana tomara dale dale asabe [1]
78|19|ara akasa unmukta kara habe, phale ta habe bahu dbarabisista [1].
78|20|Ara calamana kara habe parbatasamuhake, phale segulo haye yabe maricika [1]
78|23|Sekhane tara yuga yuga dhare abasthana karabe [1].
78|24|Sekhane tara asbadana karabe na sitalata, na kono paniya
78|27|Niscaya tara kakhano hisebera asa karata na
78|28|ara tara amadera nidarsanabalite kathorabhabe mithyaropa karechila [1].
78|30|Atahpara tomara asbada grahana kara, amara to tomadera sasti'i sudhu brd'dhi karaba.
78|35|Sekhane tara sunabe na kono asara o mithya bakya [1]
78|36|apanara rabera paksa theke puraskara, yathocita danasbarupa [1]
78|37|yini asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, dayamaya; tamra kache abedana-nibedanera sakti tadera thakabe na [1].
78|38|Sedina ruh o pheresatagana saribad'dhabhabe damrabe [1]; sedina ke'u katha balabe na, tabe ‘rahamana’ yake anumati debena se chara ebam se sathika katha balabe [2].
78|39|E dinati satya; ata'eba, yara icche se tara rabera nikata asraya grahana karuka.
78|40|Niscaya amara tomaderake asanna sasti samparke satarka karalama; yedina manusa tara krtakarma dekhate pabe ebam kaphira balabe, ‘haya! Ami yadi mati hatama [1]!’
79|10|Tara bale, ‘amara ki agera abasthaya phire yaba'i
79|12|Tara bale, ‘ta'i yadi haya tabe to eta eka sarbanasa pratyabartana.’
79|16|Yakhana tamra raba pabitra upatyaka ‘tu'oya’ya tamke deke balechilena
79|17|‘phira‘a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche,’
79|18|atahpara baluna, ‘tomara ki agraha ache ye, tumi pabitra ha'o—
79|19|‘ara ami tomake tomara rabera dike pathapradarsana kari, yate tumi tamke bhaya kara?’
79|21|Kintu se mithyaropa karala ebam abadhya hala.
79|22|Tarapara se pichane phire pratibidhane sacesta hala [1].
79|23|Atahpara se sakalake samabeta kare ghosana dila
79|25|Atahpara allah take akherate o duniyaya kathina sastite pakara'o karalena [1].
79|26|Niscaya ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya to ete siksa rayeche.
79|27|Tomaderake [1] srsti kara kathina, na asamana srsti? Tini'i ta nirmana karechena [2]
79|28|tini era chadake su'ucca karechena o subin'yasta karechena.
79|29|Ara tini era ratake karechena andhakaracchanna ebam prakasa karechena era suryaloka
79|31|Tini ta theke bera karechena tara pani o trnabhumi
79|33|esaba tomadera o tomadera catuspada jantugulora bhogera jan'ya.
79|35|manusa ya kareche ta se sedina smarana karabe
79|36|ara prakasa kara habe jahannama darsakadera jan'ya
79|40|Ara ye tara rabera abasthanake [1] bhaya kare ebam kuprabrtti hate nijake birata rakhe
79|42|Tara apanake jijnesa kare, ‘kiyamata samparke, ta kakhana ghatabe?’
79|45|ye etara bhaya rakhe apani sudhu tara satarkakari.
79|46|Yedina tara ta dekhate pabe sedina tadera mane habe yena tara duniyaya matra eka sandhya athaba eka prabhata abasthana kareche [1]
